forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
